resources:
IdealWeight Home Screen Firstly, we need to know your weight, height and gender Hello,
Your ideal weight: Weight to lose: It means you have calories to lose We have some exercise plans for you to lose some weight! Kg Gender
... Next The American College of Sports Medicine recommends a weekly 200 to 300 minutes of moderate-intensity cardio, or about 2,000 to 3,000 calories burned per week, to lose significant weight. Easy In this exercise program you will need to burn 0,25kg a week and you may reach your goal within Medium Need more challenge? In this program your target is to lose 0,5kg per week for about Hard You need to go all out on this program, you are demanded to burn 0,75kg per week and you will see the result in the next
Title News Here is some news CHOOSE YOUR LEVEL
All workouts above should be repeated 4 times

Calculate Your Weight The easiest way to calculate your weight for weightloss.
Track It ! Track your weightloss and workout easily.
Choose Your Workout You can choose your daily and personal workout for better result.
Best Recommendation We give the best recommendation for your weightloss plan !
